Otter River Adventure

How to Play

  • Use arrow keys or WASD to move the otter
  • Collect fish to earn points
  • Avoid obstacles to keep your lives
  • Game gets faster as you level up

      ↑ or W: Move Up

      ↓ or S: Move Down

      ← or A: Move Left

      → or D: Move Right
